text: If you go with the Wikipedia definitions of “Marriage” then CR7 is not married yet. During his Manchester United days, he had a one night stand with a hotel waitress(some sources say she is “American”). After few months, she became pregnant and informed CR7. She is Roman Catholic so abortion was not an option. CR7 decided to take full custody of the child and paid her a huge compensation amount of €10 million. In an interview, Ronaldo told that he will disclose the whole matter to his son Ronaldo Jr when he feels its the right time to tell. Added to this, he told that we would tell his son ...
title: Who is cristiano ronaldo's real wife?
